data.title: Kip Moore to perform acoustic show at Macon Grand Opera House
meta_keywords: National Register Of Historic Places In Bibb County
data.meta_description: MACON, Ga. — Georgia native and country music singer Kip Moore will make a stop on his “Room to Spare” acoustic tour to perform live in concert at the Grand Opera House in Macon. Moore will play April 26. Tickets are reserved seating and go on sale to the public on Friday, December 14 at 10 a. m. Ticket prices are $30, $35 and $55 and will be available for purchase online at thegrandmacon. com, by phone at 478-301-5470 and the Grand Opera House Box Office.
data.text:
MACON, Ga. — Georgia native and country music singer Kip Moore will make a stop on his “Room to Spare” acoustic tour to perform live in concert at the Grand Opera House in Macon.

Moore will play April 26.

Tickets are reserved seating and go on sale to the public on Friday, December 14 at 10 a.m.

Ticket prices are $30, $35 and $55 and will be available for purchase online at , by phone at 478-301-5470 and the Grand Opera House Box Office.
